award_title: Modeling of the New Jersey Continental Shelf in the Miocene: Insights into Sedimentation Processes, Sea-level change, and Climate
subject: Credit when your model code gets reused
body:
Stratigraphic models with Bayesian optimization workflows are tough to shareâ€”environment setup alone stops most people from running your code.

I built Ouro to turn simulation workflows into reusable blocks that are citable and show visible reuse when others build on them.

Open to chatting in January? Happy holidays.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
